datoCmsKey.name: Marissa DeVeau
datoCmsKey.locations: New York City| Philadelphia| New Jersey
datoCmsKey.bio: Marissa DeVeau is a music director, conductor, music educator, and copyist from New Jersey. She holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Music Education from Westminster Choir College. Most recently, Marissa was the music intern on Passion Project: In Concert, featuring new music written by Angela Sclafani and orchestrations by Macy Schmidt. She has also been seen music directing Party Worth Crashing at the Connelly Theater and working on several productions as a music director, AMD, and playing keys in New Jersey.
